verses.verse: It is reported<WG191> commonly<WG3654> that there is fornication<WG4202> among<WG1722> you,<WG5213> and<WG2532> such<WG5108> fornication<WG4202> as<WG3748> is not so much as<WG3761> named<WG3687> among<WG1722> the<WG3588> Gentiles,<WG1484> that<WG5620> one<WG5100> should have<WG2192> his father's<WG3962> wife.<WG1135>

And <WG2532> ye<WG5210> are<WG2075> puffed up,<WG5448> and<WG2532> have not<WG3780> rather<WG3123> mourned,<WG3996> that<WG2443> he that hath done<WG4160> this<WG5124> deed<WG2041> might be taken away<WG1808> from<WG1537> among<WG3319> you.<WG5216>

For <WG1063> I<WG1473> verily,<WG3303> as<WG5613> absent<WG548> in body,<WG4983> but<WG1161> present<WG3918> in spirit,<WG4151> have judged<WG2919> already,<WG2235> as though<WG5613> I were present,<WG3918> concerning him that hath so done<WG2716> <WG3779> this deed.<WG5124>

In <WG1722> the<WG3588> name<WG3686> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> when ye<WG5216> are gathered together,<WG4863> and<WG2532> my<WG1699> spirit,<WG4151> with<WG4862> the<WG3588> power<WG1411> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547>

To deliver<WG3860> such a one<WG5108> unto Satan<WG4567> for<WG1519> the destruction<WG3639> of the<WG3588> flesh,<WG4561> that<WG2443> the<WG3588> spirit<WG4151> may be saved<WG4982> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> day<WG2250> of the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> Jesus.<WG2424>
Your <WG5216> glorying<WG2745> is not<WG3756> good.<WG2570> Know<WG1492> ye not<WG3756> that<WG3754> a little<WG3398> leaven<WG2219> leaveneth<WG2220> the<WG3588> whole<WG3650> lump?<WG5445>

Purge out<WG1571> therefore<WG3767> the<WG3588> old<WG3820> leaven,<WG2219> that<WG2443> ye may be<WG5600> a new<WG3501> lump,<WG5445> as<WG2531> ye are<WG2075> unleavened.<WG106> For<WG1063> even<WG2532> Christ<WG5547> our<WG2257> passover<WG3957> is sacrificed<WG2380> for<WG5228> us: <WG2257>

Therefore <WG5620> let us keep the feast,<WG1858> not<WG3361> with<WG1722> old<WG3820> leaven,<WG2219> neither<WG3366> with<WG1722> the leaven<WG2219> of malice<WG2549> and<WG2532> wickedness;<WG4189> but<WG235> with<WG1722> the unleavened<WG106> bread of sincerity<WG1505> and<WG2532> truth.<WG225>
I wrote<WG1125> unto you<WG5213> in<WG1722> an epistle<WG1992> not<WG3361> to company with<WG4874> fornicators: <WG4205>

Yet <WG2532> not<WG3756> altogether<WG3843> the<WG3588> fornicators<WG4205> of this<WG5127> world,<WG2889> or<WG2228> with the<WG3588> covetous,<WG4123> or<WG2228> extortioners,<WG727> or<WG2228> with idolaters;<WG1496> for<WG1893> then<WG686> must ye needs<WG3784> go<WG1831> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> world.<WG2889>

But <WG1161> now<WG3570> I have written<WG1125> unto you<WG5213> not<WG3361> to keep company,<WG4874> if<WG1437> any man<WG5100> that is called<WG3687> a brother<WG80> be a fornicator,<WG4205> or<WG2228> covetous,<WG4123> or<WG2228> an idolater,<WG1496> or<WG2228> a railer,<WG3060> or<WG2228> a drunkard,<WG3183> or<WG2228> an extortioner;<WG727> with such a one<WG5108> no not<WG3366> to eat.<WG4906>
For <WG1063> what have I to do<WG5101> <WG3427> to judge<WG2919> them also that are without?<WG1854> <WG2532> do not<WG3780> ye<WG5210> judge<WG2919> them that are within?<WG2080>
But <WG1161> them that are without<WG1854> God<WG2316> judgeth.<WG2919> Therefore<WG2532> put away<WG1808> from<WG1537> among yourselves<WG5216> <WG848> that wicked person.<WG4190>
